snippet: The authorities in Daytona Beach are investigating an episode in which a pregnant woman drove her minivan into the Atlantic Ocean with her three children strapped in the back seat.
abstract: Florida authorities are investigating an episode in which a pregnant woman drove her minivan into the ocean in Daytona Beach with her three children strapped in the back seat; all were rescued unharmed.
lead_paragraph: The authorities in Daytona Beach are investigating an episode in which a pregnant woman drove her minivan into the Atlantic Ocean with her three children strapped in the back seat.

headline.main: Florida: Woman Drives Van With Children Into Ocean
headline.print_headline: Florida: Woman Drives Van With Children Into Ocean
